thread.title: Renne Richards Groff
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Renne Richards Groff

author: Renne Richards Groff
title: Renne Richards Groff
text: Aaron facilitated a great trip for my husband and I. His follow up was impeccable and the trip was planned flawlessly. Costa Rican Vacations took the time to understand our interests and what we wanted to see/do on our trip and made great recommendations. We received our itinerary well in advance of leaving. It was the most stress free vacation we have taken. I highly recommend Aaron and Costa Rican Vacations!
